upload_component.input_prompts: Input the prompts to generate images
upload_component.no_picture: No pictures on hand? try these below:
upload_component.upload_fail: Failed to upload file. Please try again
upload_component.wait_processing: Please wait while we are processing your image...
upload_component.out_credits: Out of credits. Please upgrade your plan to continue processing images
upload_component.ld_modal_des: For free users, uploaded images larger than 800px will be resized to 800px before processing. Upgrade to premium to increase the size limit, allowing uploads up to 3000x3000 pixels.
upload_component.warn_formats: Please upload jpg, png and WebP images.
upload_component.warn_size: File size should be less than 10MB.
upload_component.warn_no_prompts: No prompts entered. Please enter prompts to generate images.
upload_component.warn_no_image: No image added. please add one image at least.
upload_component.error_processing: Error processing the image. Please try again.
upload_component.too_many_files: Currently, we can process up to 20 images at a time. The additional images are ignored.
upload_component.zip_successfully: All images are zipped and downloaded successfully.
upload_component.zip_error: Error zipping images. Please try again.
upload_component.configure_tips: Configure output size and formats below
upload_component.configure_size: You can configure the size of the resulted files here
upload_component.configure_format: You can configure the size of the resulted files here
upload_component.resize_successfully: All images have been resized successfully
upload_component.deliver_email_8x: We will deliver the download link to your email once the process is finished.
